data.feedback: Plan covers all 4 stated requirements with accurate file mapping and proper architecture patterns. All filesToModify verified to exist. Native health permissions already configured in both Android and iOS. Minor concern about web_socket_channel vs socket_io compatibility, but follows user's explicit technology choice.
issues: Minor: web_socket_channel specified but backend uses Socket.io - consider socket_io_client for proper compatibility
suggestions: Consider using socket_io_client instead of web_socket_channel for Socket.io backend compatibility
Epic epic-native-integration can leverage existing Health Connect and HealthKit permissions already in platform configs
